summary: Underachieving, overweight kindergarten teacher Dex finds a woman who forces him to reexamine his Zen-like system of seduction.
cast: Donal Logue|Ayelet Kaznelson|John Hines|John Harrington Bland|Jessica Gormley|Mercedes Herrero|Cheryl Anne Jaroslaw|Nina Jaroslaw|David Aaron Baker|Dana Goodman|Greer Goodman|Dave Bynum|Matt Nader|Dave Terry|John Truskett|Matthew Hotsinpiller|Sue Cremin|Roxanne De Mien|Jessica Bohan|Michael Selby|Craig D. Lafayette|James 'Kimo' Wills|Tristan Bennett|Duncan North|Zak Garcia|Jacob Sanchez|Cira Sandoval|Shane Hamashige|Jeannie Bauder|Nicholas Ballas|Malaika Amon|Garland Hunter|Astro|Jason Page
title: The Tao of Steve
